directions: Heat grill to medium. Spray zucchini, corn, asparagus, tofu and scallions with oil. Season with salt and pepper. Grill scallions 2 minutes per side; tofu 2 minutes per side; zucchini and asparagus 3 minutes per side; corn 8 to 10 minutes, turning often. Cut zucchini and asparagus into bite-ize pieces. Cut corn into chunks; slice off some kernels. Slice tofu into triangles. Combine veggies, tofu and remaining ingredients in a bowl.
Combine all ingredients in a bowl; whisk until smooth. Season with salt and pepper. Divide salad greens and veggies between 2 bowls; drizzle each with 2 tablespoon dressing.
ingredients: 1 bunch asparagus (about 16 pencil-thin spears), ends trimmed
1 vine-ripened tomato, cut into bite-size chunks
title: Grilled Vegetable Salad with Tofu
